titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the Lords & Commons assembled in Parliament the humble petition of Major Hercules Langrish and Olymphas his uuife (of the right honourable family du Plessis in France), in behalfe of themselves, and of their sonnes Captaine Hercules and Cornet Lucullus.
titleStmt.author: Langrish, Hercules.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with loss of text.
"A more full relation of greiuances and demeanours ... made by Major Hercules Langrish", p. [4]-[8].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
